content.twitter:
Testing is key—not just in caregiving tasks, but also in ensuring we take care of each other! How do you test your limits to avoid burnout? #CaregiverSupport #SelfCare

#caregiving #support #community
content.linkedin:
In caregiving, just like in life, continuously testing and evaluating your boundaries can profoundly enhance your wellbeing. Remember, self-awareness begins with careful testing of your limits—both physical and emotional. Let's support each other in discovering sustainable caregiving practices. #CaregiverWellness #BurnoutPrevention #SelfCare

#caregiving #support #community
